text:
When I tryed to run default install of Cocoon 2.0.1 Final on a default install 
of Tomcat 4.0.3 Final I saw Internal Server Error 500 showing that 
CocoonServlet cannot initialize with the root cause of NoClassDefFoundError (it 
couldn't find javax.xml.transform.URIResolver). Restarting Tomcat and playing 
with different configurations couldn't help.

When I installed Cocoon 2.0.1 Final under the same conditions but on Tomcat 
4.0.1 Final it run OK!
